descriptionHtml:
Shes a short, blind Celtic(Technically Nord) archer and Follower.

Everything about her is Vanilla, uses Female Sultry Voice.

Installation: Drag and Drop ESP into Data folder
She Will be in the Companions Guild Hall in Whiterun

Mods you might see in the screenshots are DSpSOB (Dual Sheathing and Shields on back), LIAT (lively inns and taverns), Jaysus' Swords, Equipping Overhaul and Lost LongSwords which you can find all of them on the Nexus.

Feedback is welcome!
author: Morgana
